explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the integration of modern deep learning methodologies with financial factor modeling, which falls under the broader category of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The paper introduces FactorVQVAE, which is based on deep learning techniques, specifically Vector Quantized Variational Autoencoder (VQVAE) and Transformer models.
explanations.neural network: The model employs neural networks in its architecture, including an encoder-decoder-quantizer and an autoregressive Transformer.
explanations.representation learning: The paper focuses on learning latent financial factors, which is a form of representation learning.
explanations.autoencoder: The model is based on the Vector Quantized Variational Autoencoder (VQVAE), a type of autoencoder.
explanations.encoder-decoder: The model uses an encoder-decoder architecture in its first stage to compress high-dimensional input data into discrete latent factors.
explanations.attention mechanism: The autoregressive Transformer used in the second stage of the model relies on attention mechanisms to capture sequential dependencies among latent factors.
